org.encog.persist

Class EncogFileSection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.encog.persist.EncogFileSection

  • public class EncogFileSection
extends Object
    This class is used internally to parse Encog files. A file section is part of a name-value pair file.

    • Constructor Summary
